question: There are 89 first-graders at Oak Ridge School. 63 of them are girls. On Thursday, 7 first-grade girls and 6 first-grade boys were absent. How many first grade boys were at Oak Ridge School on Thursday?
answer:
Of the 89 first graders, 63 are girls, so 89 students - 63 girls = <<89-63=26>>26 boys.
On Thursday there were 26 boys - 6 absent = <<26-6=20>>20 boys.
#### 20
